Title: Starsky & Hutch
Writer: William Blinn (characters), Stevie Long (story), John O'Brien (story), John O'Brien (screenplay), Todd Phillips (screenplay), Scot Armstrong (screenplay)
Actors: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Snoop Dogg, Fred Williamson
Plot: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".
Production: Red Hour Productions, Warner Brothers, Riche-Ludwig Productions, Dimension Films, Weed Road Pictures
